title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor is opening on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference. This behavior is unexpected and causing confusion for users.
OB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, not on the target type.
EB: After fixing this issue, when double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should correctly open on the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Fix the bug causing double-clicking on import statements to open the editor on the wrong unit. Double-clicking should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
